COMMAND.NAME: getselectionendlist
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Return a list of selection ends
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Return offsets of the ends of each selection segment if there is no selection, an empty list is returned.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
